title: Salam Cafe. Episode 13 (Season  2)
creator_credit: C31 Melbourne, Jehed Dabab and Ahmed Hassan
brief_description: ‘Salam Café has no group or organisational affiliation - we’re just a group of mates who thought it might be good to give Melbourne a window on everyday Muslims, and have fun at the same time!’ In this episode Salam Cafe 2 Go visit the MCG on the Grand Final day. The panel interview Qamar Atosh, the National Winner of the YAMY award. Along with our previous guest Monique to discuss the YAMY night. In the absense of Susan, her husband Waleed reveals the winner of the photo comp. We hear about the recent Declaration of Faith Based Schools drafted by representatives of Christian, Jewish and Islamic Colleges.
